fields.movie_details: Savi is a 2024 Indian Hindi-language action thriller film directed by Abhinay Deo and produced by Mukesh Bhatt, Bhushan Kumar and Krishan Kumar under Vishesh Films and T-Series Films. The film stars Anil Kapoor, Divya Khossla and Harshvardhan Rane, and is a modern-day retelling of the tale of Savitri and Satyavan.

When Lucy unknowingly becomes part of a drug trade, sinister individuals insert medications in her body. They then give her unique abilities, which she uses to gain vengeance against her perpetrators.
